title: Jerry Brown’s mansion makeover: Sawzall, $34 bathroom scale, $16,609 fridge
text:
Jerry Brown’s mansion makeover: Sawzall, $34 bathroom scale, $16,609 fridge 
California governor’s renovated mansion includes $16,609 refrigerator dubbed ‘monument to food preservation’ 
Purchase orders include $34,758 for cabinets, $27 for Bondo 
Renovation funded by proceeds from sale of old Carmichael mansion Capitol Alert 
The go-to source for news on California policy and politics A gate on the east side of the historic Governor's Mansion in Sacramento on October 16, 2015. Randall Benton rbenton@sacbee.com i
